biotools.summary: The package covid19census provides functions to extract COVID-19 cases, deaths, hospitalizations and test of U.S. and Italy at the county and regional level, respectively, and then combines them with other population metrics (age, sex, prevalence of chronic conditions, income indexes, access to health services and many others).

bioschemas.name: covid19census
bioschemas.summary: The package covid19census provides functions to extract COVID-19 cases, deaths, hospitalizations and test of U.S. and Italy at the county and regional level, respectively, and then combines them with other population metrics (age, sex, prevalence of chronic conditions, income indexes, access to health services and many others).
